SELECT SC.SPACE_NO,SPACE_TYPE,IMG_MAIN,SPACE_NAME,ADDRESS,SPACE_TAG,PRICE_WEEKDAY,TIME_OR_DAY,PRICE_STANDARD,HEART,RANK FROM SPACE SC INNER JOIN SPACE_RESERVE_INFO SRI ON SC.SPACE_NO=SRI.SPACE_NO WHERE SPACE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchSpace} || '%' OR SPACE_TYPE LIKE '%' || #{searchSpace} || '%' OR SPACE_TAG LIKE '%' || #{searchSpace} || '%' OR ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{searchSpace} || '%' ORDER BY HEART DESC

SELECT A.*,ROWNUM FROM (SELECT SC.SPACE_NO,SPACE_TYPE,IMG_MAIN,SPACE_NAME,ADDRESS,SPACE_TAG,PRICE_WEEKDAY,TIME_OR_DAY,PRICE_STANDARD,HEART,RANK FROM SPACE SC INNER JOIN SPACE_RESERVE_INFO SRI ON SC.SPACE_NO=SRI.SPACE_NO ORDER BY HEART DESC)A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 9
